workexp.jobdescription: I have worked on various RPA tools like UiPath and WorkFusion. I had also worked on two client project which helped them to reduce their repetitive work drastically along with that I worked on Chat Bot made in Python and have used Flask(Python 3) and MongoDB.

1. Created a tour for the seller website that helps the user navigate and gives information about newly introduced features. 2. Used technologies like Java for the backend and React framework for frontend.3. Designed an algorithm to display user dashboard based on preference loaded from DynamoDB.

projects.name: Restaurants suggestion
projects.title: Course project for Data Mining
projects.description: Developed a web application for providing restaurant suggestion based on user’s choice of preference for ambience, food, service. Developed an algorithm to classify the reviews based on aspect I.e. classification based on aspect

projects.name: JSNumpy
projects.title: Contribution to open source project
projects.description: Developed a JavaScript based library similar to Numpy in Python which is used to perform complex matrix operations in JavaScript. Published this library on Node Package Manager (NPM) (https://www.npm.js.com/package/jsnumpy)

projects.name: Providing Dietary Recommendation using Artificial Intelligence
projects.title: Final year undergraduate project
projects.description: Collected data using web scraping using publically available APIs for nutrient content of various food items. Created a chromosome which is the basic unit for genetic algorithm depending upon the person’s intake. Used technologies like MongoDB, Express, Node.js and JavaScript.
